Texts.Chs: 狩猎将帮助你获得诸如^green;生肉^reset;、^green;皮革^reset;和^orange;骨头^reset;等资源。试着在你的^green;[C]制造^reset;菜单的武器标签里做一把^orange;骨制长矛^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: Hunting will help you obtain resources such as ^green;Raw Meat^reset;, ^green;Leather^reset; and ^orange;Bone^reset;. Try making a ^orange;Primitive Spear^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting^reset; menu under the Weapons tab.

Texts.Chs: 你还可以使用^orange;弓箭、^orange;投掷矛^reset;和^orange;狩猎步枪^reset;进行狩猎。这对你的生存至关重要，因为采集^orange;生肉^reset是做饭和进餐关键步骤。
Texts.Eng: You can also hunt using ^orange;Bows^reset; or ^orange;Throwing Spears^reset; and ^orange;Hunting Rifles^reset;. It will be critical to your survival, as the primary means to gather ^orange;Raw Meat^reset; for cooking and eating.
